Reviews: Disgusting. Ordered on Uber eats and it was awful quality of food . The chicken was PINK still. You can also tell they use nasty oil (and probably don't clean the oil) to fry everything in. I didn't even finish eating it even though I was starving. I am not a picky eater either. DO NOT EAT HERE
Relevant Content: *awful quality of food *chicken was PINK still *use nasty oil to fry everything *didn't even finish eating it
Replies: * Poor food quality * Undercooked chicken * Unpleasant frying oil * Left meal unfinished

Reviews: Disgusting!!! Do not eat here. Ordered on doordash. Not even one star. Chicken was pink still and not crispy or spicy at all. Disgusting. Also fries are like 5 dollars extra and they only serve you a few fries. Not worth spending your money or risking your health!!
Relevant Content: *Chicken was pink still *Not crispy or spicy at all *Fries are like 5 dollars extra and they only serve you a few fries
Replies: * Undercooked chicken * Lacked crispiness and spice * Overpriced, small serving of fries

Reviews: Food was ordered through door dash and just the worst! Fried chicken sandwich was cold, the chicken was smashed way too thin and had too much breading. Truly, so awful.
Relevant Content: *Fried chicken sandwich was cold *chicken was smashed way too thin *had too much breading *Truly, so awful
Replies: * Fried chicken sandwich issues: - Cold - Thin chicken - Excessive breading - Overall, awful

Reviews: This place is up on door dash, I don't even know if it's the same place but, if it is, it's fake. Just ordered the vegan burger, and when I took a bite, it tasted like real meat. Lo and behold, it was real f-cking meat. Absolutely disgusting, and extremely disrespectful.  I ordered the vegan burger, i have a diet restriction due to my health, so ive been vegan to accommodate my health. I can't eat real meat, I can't eat dairy, and these wise guys here either don't care, are discriminatory towards vegans, or are just stupid stupid and stupid.  We can sue you for this. Don't be surprised if you get sued.
Relevant Content: *Ordered the vegan burger, but it tasted like real meat *Absolutely disgusting, and extremely disrespectful *Can't eat real meat or dairy due to health reasons
Replies: * Vegan burger tasted like real meat * Disgusting and disrespectful * Can't consume meat or dairy for health reasons

Reviews: The food is over-cooked, cold, chewy, unedible.
Relevant Content: *The food is over-cooked, cold, chewy, unedible.

Reviews: Nasty...nasty...nasty.  Cold no taste at all.  Onion rings are fried onions not breaded.  The worst food I have had delivered during the pandemic.  I have Lupus I am limited on going out to eat, but you hope trying a new restaurant would be a good experience.  This is not the place.

Summary: Reviews on the food quality at Beverly Hills Burger Bungalow seem to be predominantly negative. Major issues include undercooked chicken, unpleasant frying oil, and small servings of fries for the price. In addition, there are concerns with the fried chicken sandwich being cold, thin, and excessively breaded. For vegan customers, there was dissatisfaction with the vegan burger resembling real meat, which was both unpleasant and disrespectful to their dietary needs. Other issues include over-cooked, cold, and chewy food, leading to an overall unpleasant experience. Based on these reviews, the food quality at Beverly Hills Burger Bungalow is in need of significant improvement.
